title: My Racial Bias Test
subtitle: My Racial Bias Test
disclaimer: This result is for educational purposes only and is not a professional psychological diagnosis. Please use it as a tool for self-reflection and growth.
disclaimerLanding: This test is not a psychological diagnosis and is provided for educational and self-reflection purposes. The results do not judge your character and are intended as a tool for self-reflection and growth.
intro: This test is an educational tool to help you explore your unconscious biases, raise awareness of diversity, and gain practical solutions for personal growth.
importantList: This test does not label anyone as a 'racist'
The results are for self-reflection, not psychological diagnosis
All answers are anonymous and no personal information is collected
Results are deleted when you close the browser

0-10.analysis: You show excellent awareness of diversity and inclusivity! Your open-minded attitude demonstrates a deep understanding of different cultures and perspectives.
tips: Continue to be a positive influence in promoting understanding and respect
Share your inclusive mindset with others
Support diversity initiatives in your community

11-20.analysis: You have a good foundation for understanding diversity. With a little more awareness and education, you can become even more inclusive.
tips: Learn more about different cultures and perspectives
Seek out diverse experiences and interactions
Challenge your own assumptions about others

21-30.analysis: You show moderate awareness of diversity issues. Consider learning more about different cultures and perspectives.
tips: Educate yourself about unconscious bias
Seek opportunities to interact with diverse groups
Practice empathy and active listening

31-40.analysis: You may have some unconscious biases that could benefit from education and self-reflection.
tips: Read books and articles about diversity and inclusion
Attend workshops on unconscious bias
Reflect on your own experiences and assumptions

41-50.analysis: You might benefit from more education about diversity and inclusion.
tips: Seek out resources about different cultures
Practice mindfulness and self-reflection
Engage in conversations about diversity

51-60.analysis: You may have some biases that could be addressed through education and self-reflection.
tips: Learn about the history and experiences of different groups
Practice perspective-taking exercises
Seek feedback from diverse perspectives

61-70.analysis: You might have some unconscious biases that could benefit from education and self-reflection.
tips: Take courses on diversity and inclusion
Practice cultural humility
Engage in self-reflection exercises

71-80.analysis: You may have some biases that could be addressed through education and self-reflection.
tips: Seek professional development on diversity
Practice active listening and empathy
Challenge your own stereotypes and assumptions

81-90.analysis: You might have some unconscious biases that could benefit from education and self-reflection.
tips: Engage in diversity training programs
Practice cultural competency skills
Seek mentorship from diverse leaders

91-100.analysis: You show excellent awareness of diversity and inclusivity! Your open-minded attitude demonstrates a deep understanding of different cultures and perspectives.
tips: Continue to be a positive influence in promoting understanding and respect
Share your inclusive mindset with others
Support diversity initiatives in your community
